# Copilot instructions for neurontainer

`neurontainer` is a Docker Desktop extension to allow the AI streamer Neuro-sama to control the Docker daemon. The extension operates using the Docker socket and a Preact-based frontend UI.

## Resources

You can learn about the TypeScript Neuro SDK [at its GitHub repo](https://github.com/AriesAlex/typescript-neuro-game-sdk).

The Neuro SDK spec can be found [here](https://github.com/VedalAI/neuro-sdk).

The TypeScript Docker SDK can be found [at its GitHub repo](https://github.com/docker/node-sdk/). The Docker Desktop Client docs for the Preact frontend can be found on [Docker's docs](https://docs.docker.com/extensions/extensions-sdk/dev/api/overview/)
